casebody.data:
KEGLEY, et al.
v.
CITY OF FAYETTEVILLE. No. 342P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 29, 2004. Robert E. Hornick, Jr., for Kegley, et al. Anthony Fox, Charlotte, C. Wes Hodges, II, Wilmington, for City of Fayetteville.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of July 2004 by Respondent for Reconsideration:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of July 2004."
